This game is great, although people can be a bit toxic at times.  I really like the simple to understand, difficult to master mechanics, the wide map selection, and the variety of game modes that were put into the game.  Sometimes there are cheaters but ever since the game went free to play and I got prime, the number of cheaters I've found has actually gone down.  Would recommend, still probably my favorite shooter to play.

This is just a top tier game no doubt has a slight problem wit hackers but what games doesn't. I would highly recommend for anyone who likes fps's or team games, as in the more competitive modes team work is a must but in casual it is rare to see the team actually communicating. I hope this helps :] bye
